item.title: Reddit 本周股价大涨，强劲交易开端面临考验
item.description: Reddit Inc. 涨幅达 67%，成为今年最炙手可热的新上市公司之一，但季度业绩和禁止内部人士出售的限制到期，即将对这些涨幅构成考验。【原文：A 67% rally for Reddit Inc. has made it one of the year’s hottest newly public companies, but quarterly results and the expiration of a restriction preventing insiders from selling are about to test those gains.】

item.title: 加密 ETF 综合基金在首次大型压力测试中遭遇抛售狂潮
item.description: 投资者从加密货币相关基金中撤资近 5 亿美元，因为全球市场崩溃引发了这一投机性资产类别自今年早些时候通过 ETF 成为主流以来的首次大跌。【原文：Investors yanked nearly half a billion dollars from cryptocurrency-linked funds as a global market meltdown sparked the first major selloff for the speculative asset class since it went mainstream via ETFs earlier this year.】

item.title: 它伤害了信心："波动性颠覆了快乐的加密货币叙事
item.description: 有那么一瞬间，对于数字资产支持者来说，一切似乎都朝着正确的方向发展。美国批准了两种最大加密货币的 ETF，美国总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普转而成为支持者，比特币也不再与股市波动紧密相连。【原文：For a brief moment, everything appeared to be lining up in the right direction for digital-asset proponents. The US approved ETFs for the two largest cryptocurrencies, US presidential candidate Donald Trump shifted to being a supporter and Bitcoin was no longer so closely tied to stock market swings.】

item.title: 以色列与伊朗的全面战争会是什么样子？

item.title: 墨西哥比索在一天内经历了一年的波动，套利效应逐渐减弱
item.description: 墨西哥比索在拉丁美洲利差交易头寸平仓中首当其冲，周一跌至近两年来的最低点，在该地区同类货币中跌幅最大。【原文：Mexico’s peso is taking the brunt of an unwinding in carry trade positions in Latin America, slumping to the lowest in almost two years on Monday and leading losses among its regional peers.】

item.title: 做市商 Susquehanna 周一出现故障
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，在全球股市大跌的背景下，做市商苏斯克汉纳国际集团（Susquehanna International Group）周一出现了故障。【原文：The market maker Susquehanna International Group experienced outages on Monday amid a global selloff of stocks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 利率不确定性上升，抵押债券落后于国债
item.description: 周一，利率走向的不确定性不断增加，刺激机构抵押贷款债券的表现逊于国债，因为投资者担心潜在的降息会带来更多的房主再融资。【原文：Growing uncertainty about the direction of interest rates spurred agency mortgage bonds to perform worse than Treasuries on Monday as investors braced for potential rate cuts to bring more homeowner refinancings.】

item.title: 交易员因数周前下注美联储降息而获利丰厚
item.description: 七月份，交易员们对美联储超大规模的降息进行了看似遥不可及的押注，如今，在市场大幅波动之后，他们有望获得巨额利润。【原文：Traders who in July made what appeared to be long-shot bets on supersized Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts are now in line to reap huge profits after markets lurched their way.】

item.title: 贸易商权衡经济衰退和风暴风险，小麦和棉花价格下滑
item.description: 由于交易商估计到经济衰退的风险和热带风暴黛比的威胁，包括小麦和棉花在内的农产品周一出现下滑，不过抛售并不像全球其他金融行业那样严重。【原文：Agricultural commodities including wheat and cotton slumped Monday as traders gauged recession risks and the threat from Tropical Storm Debby, though the selling wasn’t as severe as in other global financial sectors.】

item.title: 创纪录的 VIX 指数飙升震撼了华尔街交易员，他们全情投入市场的平静
item.description: 周一各种资产的崩盘正在打击一系列押注股市持久平静的衍生品交易，有可能引发连锁反应，加剧全球动荡。【原文：The Monday meltdown across assets is hammering a slew of derivatives trades betting on enduring calm in the stock market — threatening to set off a chain reaction that could intensify the global turbulence.】

item.title: 埃德-雅德尼说，这可能是 1987 年式的下滑，政策正在发生转变
item.description: 长期市场和经济观察家埃德-雅德尼说，当前的全球股市大跌与 1987 年的股灾有一些相似之处，当时尽管投资者担心，但经济还是避免了下滑。【原文：Longtime market and economy watcher Ed Yardeni said that the current global equities selloff bears some similarity to the 1987 crash, when the economy averted a downturn despite investor fears at the time.】

item.title: 2024 年跟踪记录完美的债券策略闪现卖出信号
item.description: 一种以动量为基础的技术策略在今年的长期国债交易中取得了 100%的胜率，该策略周一发出了卖出信号。【原文：A momentum-based technical strategy that has had a 100% winning record in trading long-term Treasuries this year flashed a sell signal Monday.】

item.title: Cemex 以 9.5 亿美元出售多米尼加共和国业务
item.description: Cemex SAB 同意以 9.5 亿美元的价格出售其在多米尼加共和国的子公司，因为这家墨西哥水泥生产商更加关注美国市场。【原文：Cemex SAB agreed to sell its Dominican Republic subsidiary for $950 million as the Mexican cement maker sharpens its focus on the US market.】

item.title: 莫尔公司首席执行官称，乌克兰卢克石油公司的制裁不太可能导致供应短缺
item.description: Mol Nyrt.炼油厂首席执行官说，匈牙利不会因为乌克兰决定阻止卢克石油股份公司原油过境而遭受石油短缺。【原文：Hungary won’t suffer any oil shortages because of Ukraine’s decision to block the transit of Lukoil PJSC’s crude, the chief executive officer of refiner Mol Nyrt. said.】

item.title: Vanguard 首席执行官旨在为私人资产带来低成本投资
item.description: Vanguard 集团首席执行官萨利姆-拉姆吉（Salim Ramji）说，他的公司 "真正关注 "的是低成本投资，他最终希望将这一理念带入私人资产领域。【原文：Vanguard Group Chief Executive Officer Salim Ramji said his firm is “really about” low-cost investing, and that he’d eventually like that to carry into the world of private assets.】

item.title: 印度最大石油生产商利润因产量和税收减少而下降
item.description: 国营石油和天然气公司的季度利润同比下降 15%，原因是油价上涨被低产量和暴利税的增加所抵消。【原文：State-run Oil and Natural Gas Corp.’s quarterly profit declined 15% on year as higher oil prices were offset by low production and an increase in windfall tax.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Walleye 辞退十几名员工，包括股票资本市场主管
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，对冲基金 Walleye Capital 已经裁减了大约十几个职位，其中包括股票资本市场主管的职位。【原文：Hedge fund Walleye Capital has cut about a dozen jobs, including the role of head of equity capital markets, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: SVB 破产计划获批，但 20 亿美元的 FDIC 斗争仍在继续
item.description: 法官批准了 SVB 金融集团的重组协议，但该公司在与联邦监管机构的斗争中遭遇挫折，无法收回硅谷银行子公司去年倒闭时的约 20 亿美元资产。【原文：A judge approved SVB Financial Group’s restructuring deal but dealt the company a setback in its fight with federal regulators to recover about $2 billion it had at its Silicon Valley Bank subsidiary when it collapsed last year.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行将以 30% 的折扣出售泰晤士河水务公司债务
item.description: 据熟悉该交易的人士透露，蒙特利尔银行以将近 30% 的折扣出售了泰晤士水务公司约 3 亿英镑（3.83 亿美元）的优先债务。【原文：Bank of Montreal has sold about £300 million ($383 million) of Thames Water’s senior debt at an almost 30% discount, according to people familiar with the transaction.】

item.title: 吸金数十亿的科技 ETF 因亏损高达 60% 而备受打击
item.description: 上个月，交易员们投入数十亿美元押注科技股大幅反弹。现在，他们的杠杆式 ETF 仓位在市场的全面崩溃中遭到重创。【原文：Traders plowed billions of dollars into betting on a big rebound in tech stocks last month. Now their leveraged-up ETF positions are getting thrashed in the sweeping market meltdown.】

item.title: 全球市场崩溃加深，大宗商品面临危机蔓延
item.description: 随着全球金融市场崩溃范围的扩大，从铜、黄金到原油等大宗商品暴跌，交易员们急于从获利交易中套现，并在整个工业原材料市场重新押注看跌。【原文：Commodities from copper and gold to crude oil plunged as a global meltdown in financial markets broadened, with traders rushing to cash out of profitable trades and place fresh bearish bets across industrial raw-material markets.】

item.title: 比特币和以太币 ETF 在全球股市下跌中受到冲击
item.description: 在全球股市大跌的背景下，比特币和以太币这两种全球最大的加密货币跌至几个月来的最低价格水平，投资者纷纷抛售比特币和以太币交易所交易基金的股票。【原文：Investors dumped shares of Bitcoin and Ether exchange-traded funds in droves as the world’s two largest cryptocurrencies plunged to their lowest price levels in months amid a global equity selloff.】

item.title: TPG 直接借贷部门为第五期基金募集 39 亿美元资金
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，TPG 公司旗下的双溪资本合伙公司（Twin Brook Capital Partners）完成了其第五只直接借贷基金的募集，资本承诺总额达 39 亿美元，超过了 30 亿美元的目标。【原文：TPG Inc.’s Twin Brook Capital Partners closed its fifth direct lending fund with $3.9 billion of aggregate capital commitments, surpassing a $3 billion target, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 恒大向创始人许家印等追讨 60 亿美元
item.description: 中国恒大集团及其清算人正寻求从包括该开发商创始人许家印在内的七名被告处追回 60 亿美元的股息和报酬。【原文：China Evergrande Group and its liquidators are seeking to recover $6 billion in dividends and remuneration from seven defendants including the developer’s founder Hui Ka Yan.】

item.title: 市场下滑，现金涌出跨商品ETF
item.description: 上周，投资者从基础广泛的大宗商品交易所交易基金（ETF）中撤资超过 8 亿美元，在对世界两大经济体健康状况的担忧中，投资者减少了对原材料价格的押注。【原文：Investors pulled more than $800 million from broad-based commodity ETFs last week, dialing back bets on raw materials prices amid concerns about the health of the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 欧元升至七个月高点，美联储降息呼声渐高
item.description: 欧元攀升至七个月来的最强水平，因为有迹象表明美国经济比之前想象的要疲软得多，这增强了对美联储降息的押注，从而降低了美元的吸引力。【原文：The euro climbed to the strongest level in seven months as signs the US economy is much weaker than previously thought bolstered bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts, reducing the attractiveness of the dollar.】

item.title: 摩根大通交易平台称 "接近 "逢低买入机会
